data.title: Top RKO Horrors of the Golden Age
data.meta_description: At first, I thought that this wouldn't be a very interesting project.  After all, it would just be "King Kong" and a bunch of Lewtons.  But I forgot
data.text: YEAR TITLE GENRE 1930 Check and Double Check 1932 Ghost Valley Most Dangerous Game, The Phantom of Crestwood, The Secrets of the French Police Thirteen Women 1933 Before Dawn Deluge [RKO release] King Kong Monkey's Paw, The Son of Kong 1935 Return of Peter Grimm, The She 1936 Mummy's Boys 1937 Super-Sleuth 1939 Hunchback of Notre Dame, The 1940 Beyond Tomorrow Stranger On the 3rd Floor, The You'll Find Out 1941 All That Money Can Buy 1942 Mexican Spitfire Sees a Ghost 1943 Cat People Falcon and the Co-Eds, The Ghost Ship, The I Walked with a Zombie Leopard Man, The Seventh Victim, The Tarzan's Desert Mystery Two Weeks To Live 1944 Curse of the Cat People Gildersleeve's Ghost Passport to Destiny 1945 Brighton Strangler, The Body Snatcher, The Enchanted Cottage, The Game of Death, A Isle of the Dead Man Alive Zombies On Broadway 1946 Bedlam Genius At Work It's a Wonderful Life Spiral Staircase, The Tarzan and the Leopard Woman 1947 Dick Tracy Meets Gruesome Locket, The Secret Life of Walter Mitty, The 1948 Tarzan and the Mermaids 1949 Boy with Green Hair, The Mighty Joe Young Tarzan's Magic Fountain
